1. China develops new light-based chiplet that could power artificial general intelligence — where AI is smarter than humans  Livescience.com
  2. A New Photonic Computer Chip Uses Light to Slash AI Energy Costs  Singularity Hub
  3. Could China's Taichi light-based chip show the way on AI?  South China Morning Post
  4. Taichi: A large-scale diffractive hybrid photonic AI chiplet  Tech Xplore
  5. AI Chip Trims Energy Budget Back by 99+ Percent  IEEE Spectrum
